text: @JohnRLottJr @JohnRLottJr Will you acknowledge the fact that the CDC overestimates the number of flu deaths annually? No, because it doesn’t fit the narrative you are pushing. People are under the impression that covid-19 is just the flu when it is far deadlier. Please acknowledge the facts.
